alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Union; Wayne (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 27 at 1:59PM EST until February 27 at 2:30PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 PM EST FOR SOUTHEASTERN WAYNE...NORTHERN UNION AND EAST CENTRAL FAYETTE COUNTIES IN EAST CENTRAL INDIANA... At 159 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Connersville, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Richmond, Connersville, Centerville, Waterloo, Abington, Spring Grove, Boston, Whitewater, Richmond Municipal Airport, Mettel Field, Middleboro, Philomath, Beesons and Witts Station. This includes I-70 in Indiana between mile markers 148 and 156. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM EST for east central Indiana...and west central Ohio. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
